question: The 71st Session of the WHO's World Health Assembly will be held in __________, Switzerland.
explanation: The 71st Session of the WHO's World Health Assembly will be held in Geneva, Switzerland from 21 to 26 May 2018. The WHA will be attended by delegations from all WHO Member States, the Indian Delegation will be led by Union Health Minister of India, J P Nadda. The theme chosen for World Health Assembly 2018 is "Health for All: Commit To Universal Health Coverage".
